```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Opgave 2.15
```{r}
library(readr)
survey <- read_csv("data/data/survey.csv")
library(tidyverse)

survey|>
  summarise(mean(tvhours),median(tvhours),sd(tvhours),IQR(tvhours))
ggplot(data=survey, mapping = aes(x = tvhours))+geom_histogram()

```

```{r}
library(readr)
survey <- read_csv("data/data/survey.csv")
library(tidyverse)

survey|>
  specify(tvhours) |>
  generate(reps=50,type = "bootstrap") |>
  calculate(Test= "mean")
```
